description: Dashboard for monitoring individual SFS HDFS Client nodes performance and operations

targets.expr: rate( sfs_hdfs_rpc_response_duration_count {sfs_hostname=~"$cluster-.*",hdfs_nsid="$nsid",client_ip="$node"} [$__rate_interval] )
targets.query: rate( sfs_hdfs_rpc_response_duration_count {sfs_hostname=~"$cluster-.*",hdfs_nsid="$nsid",client_ip="$node"} [$__rate_interval] )

targets.expr: (rate( sfs_hdfs_rpc_response_duration_sum {sfs_hostname=~"$cluster-.*",hdfs_nsid="$nsid",client_ip="$node"} [$__rate_interval] ) / rate( sfs_hdfs_rpc_response_duration_count {sfs_hostname=~"$cluster-.*",hdfs_nsid="$nsid",client_ip="$node"} [$__rate_interval] ))
targets.query: (rate( sfs_hdfs_rpc_response_duration_sum {sfs_hostname=~"$cluster-.*",hdfs_nsid="$nsid",client_ip="$node"} [$__rate_interval] ) / rate( sfs_hdfs_rpc_response_duration_count {sfs_hostname=~"$cluster-.*",hdfs_nsid="$nsid",client_ip="$node"} [$__rate_interval] ))

targets.expr: rate( sfs_hdfs_rpc_request_size_bytes_sum {sfs_hostname=~"$cluster-.*",hdfs_nsid="$nsid",client_ip="$node",method="PREAD"} [$__rate_interval] )
targets.query: rate( sfs_hdfs_rpc_request_size_bytes_sum {sfs_hostname=~"$cluster-.*",hdfs_nsid="$nsid",client_ip="$node",method="PREAD"} [$__rate_interval] )

targets.expr: rate( sfs_hdfs_rpc_request_size_bytes_sum {sfs_hostname=~"$cluster-.*",hdfs_nsid="$nsid",client_ip="$node",method="WRITE"} [$__rate_interval] )
targets.query: rate( sfs_hdfs_rpc_request_size_bytes_sum {sfs_hostname=~"$cluster-.*",hdfs_nsid="$nsid",client_ip="$node",method="WRITE"} [$__rate_interval] )

targets.expr: sum( sfs_hdfs_rpc_inflight_count {sfs_hostname=~"$cluster-.*",hdfs_nsid="$nsid",client_ip="$node"} )
targets.query: sum( sfs_hdfs_rpc_inflight_count {sfs_hostname=~"$cluster-.*",hdfs_nsid="$nsid",client_ip="$node"} )

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.01, sum without(sfs_hostname) (rate(sfs_hdfs_rpc_response_duration_bucket{sfs_hostname=~"$cluster-.*", hdfs_nsid="$nsid", client_ip="$node"}[$__rate_interval])))
targets.query: histogram_quantile(0.01, sum without(sfs_hostname) (rate(sfs_hdfs_rpc_response_duration_bucket{sfs_hostname=~"$cluster-.*", hdfs_nsid="$nsid", client_ip="$node"}[$__rate_interval])))

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.9, sum without(sfs_hostname) (rate(sfs_hdfs_rpc_response_duration_bucket{sfs_hostname=~"$cluster-.*", hdfs_nsid="$nsid", client_ip="$node"}[$__rate_interval])))
targets.query: histogram_quantile(0.9, sum without(sfs_hostname) (rate(sfs_hdfs_rpc_response_duration_bucket{sfs_hostname=~"$cluster-.*", hdfs_nsid="$nsid", client_ip="$node"}[$__rate_interval])))

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.5, sum without(sfs_hostname) (rate(sfs_hdfs_rpc_response_duration_bucket{sfs_hostname=~"$cluster-.*", hdfs_nsid="$nsid", client_ip="$node"}[$__rate_interval])))
targets.query: histogram_quantile(0.5, sum without(sfs_hostname) (rate(sfs_hdfs_rpc_response_duration_bucket{sfs_hostname=~"$cluster-.*", hdfs_nsid="$nsid", client_ip="$node"}[$__rate_interval])))

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.95, sum without(sfs_hostname) (rate(sfs_hdfs_rpc_response_duration_bucket{sfs_hostname=~"$cluster-.*", hdfs_nsid="$nsid", client_ip="$node"}[$__rate_interval])))
targets.query: histogram_quantile(0.95, sum without(sfs_hostname) (rate(sfs_hdfs_rpc_response_duration_bucket{sfs_hostname=~"$cluster-.*", hdfs_nsid="$nsid", client_ip="$node"}[$__rate_interval])))
